```{r}

library(ISCB2017)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
X <- do.call('rbind', 
             lapply(F244088f,
                    function(x){data.frame(peptide=x$peptideSequence,
                        rtms2=x$rtinseconds/60)}))

PP<-unique(X$peptide)
```

```{r}
r <- lapply(F247106, function(x){
  if(x$peptideSequence %in% PP){
    title <- unlist(strsplit(as.character(x$title), split='/'))
    data.frame(peptide=x$peptideSequence, 
               rt=x$rtinseconds, 
               title = title[length(title)])
    } else{NULL}
  })

rr <- do.call('rbind', r[which(!sapply(r, is.null))])
```
